modShortDescription: Let's you show off your favorite coveralls or ZU t-shirt without that pesky heavy armor getting in the way. The dye must be made using a recipe.
modDescription:
Turns clear/invisible whatever piece of clothing or armor it is installed in. Let’s you show off your favorite coveralls or ZU t-shirt without that pesky heavy armor getting in the way.

This doesn’t turn the wearer invisible, merely the piece of clothing, revealing whatever you would look like if you weren’t wearing it.

The dye must be made using a recipe that requires Blue, Red, and Green dyes. It will not show up on random loot.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/stamplesmods/7d2dmodlets/tree/master/EmperorDye)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/16096-stamples-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Stample](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/stample/)
